transcript.content: The senate will come to
order, the sergeant at
arms will close the doors, members will get to their seats.
Leading the Senate in prayers is
Senator Alexander Wake county all members and guests please stand.
Dear heavenly father we want
to thank you for this day, we
want to thank you for the
men and the women who
lead our legislature and heavenly
father we're weak we need your guidance.
We asked it.
You be with us Heavenly Father
as we work on our budget
and other laws that we create
and not our will but thy will be done.
Is in Jesus name we pray, Amen.
Senator Alexander is recognized for a motion.
Thank you Mr. President.
The journal of Thursday September 3rd
2015 has been examined and is found to be correct.
I move that spend
with the reading of the journal
and it stands approved is written.
Without objection the journal
for September third stands approved is written.
Notices and announcements, if there
is no further business to come
before the senate, if not
the chair recognizes senate Alexander for the motions.
Thank you Mr. President, I move
that the senate do now adjourn
subject to the standard stipulation
set forward by senate laws
24.1 and receipt messages
from the house to reconvene Tuesday
September the 8th 2015 at 2:00 PM.
The motion that at
the senate now adjourn subject to
the stipulation stated by senator
Alexander to reconvene Tuesday
September 8th at 2:00 pm
seconded by Senator Brown, all
in favor say I I Oppose
no, the I's have
it and the standard now stands adjourned.
